options.text: "You have to destroy the city!" gasps @@RANDOM_NAME@@, one of the few who escaped before the quarantine. "It's hell in there! If those things manage to escape then the whole country, nay the whole WORLD is doomed! We must send our biggest bombs into those streets and wipe them out!"
options.result: the nation has a strict 'no marauding undead' law (@@EGG@@)

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: barren, inhospitable landscape
policiesAndNotabilities.name: barren, inhospitable landscape

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: hatred of cheese
policiesAndNotabilities.name: hatred of cheese

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: punitive income tax rates
policiesAndNotabilities.name: punitive income tax rates

options.text: "No, there are people in there who need our help," says @@RANDOM_NAME@@, armed with a Winchester rifle. "We can't leave them to the mercy of the undead hordes. I say before we blow anything up we call in the army and anyone else willing to help, go in, track down any survivors we can find, and get them out. It's dangerous, but it's got to be done."
options.result: volunteers are signing up to take arms against an incursion of flesh-eating zombies (@@EGG@@)

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: punitive income tax rates
policiesAndNotabilities.name: punitive income tax rates

options.text: "I think we should study these creatures," muses Professor @@RANDOM_NAME@@, expert in biological warfare. "Zombiism? Reanimated dead tissue? Fascinating! This is a golden opportunity for our nation... why, we could unleash these on our enemies! Everyone would shake in terror of our undead army!"
options.result: international organisations everywhere are united in their condemnation of the nation's zombified military (@@EGG@@)

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: complete lack of public education
policiesAndNotabilities.name: complete lack of public education

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: punitive income tax rates
policiesAndNotabilities.name: punitive income tax rates

options.text: "Wow, these unholy terrors are really scary," notes @@RANDOM_NAME@@, selling sausages in buns to bystanders. "They would make a great honeypot. I mean, how often do you see the living dead?! We could really turn a profit if we turn this place into a first-class thrill ride for visiting tourists. Want mustard?"
options.result: the flesh-eating lost souls that wander at night serve as a major tourist attraction (@@EGG@@)

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: deadly medical pandemics
policiesAndNotabilities.name: deadly medical pandemics

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: punitive income tax rates
policiesAndNotabilities.name: punitive income tax rates

options.text: "I think we're forgetting that these 'zombies' are people just like you and me!" objects @@RANDOM_NAME@@, head of the newly-formed Undead Protection Alliance. "They deserve the respect that any deceased person should, if not more! Leave them alone, and let them have the city. It will be a victory for oppressed minorities everywhere!"
options.result: the undead are an officially recognised ethnic minority (@@EGG@@)

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: deadly medical pandemics
policiesAndNotabilities.name: deadly medical pandemics

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: punitive income tax rates

options.text: "Braaains... braaains...?" asks ardent anti-quarantine activist @@RANDOM_NAME@@. "Braaains... braaains... braaains!"
options.result: the undead roam the streets and countryside at night (@@EGG@@)
